traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The azer’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components: * At will: mending, produce flame, comprehend languages, mold earth * 2/day each: cure wounds (elementals only), shield, aganazzar’s scorcher * 1/day each: fireball, enhance ability, invisibility

traits.name: Heated Weapons
traits.desc: When the azer hits with a metal melee weapon, it deals an extra 3 (1d6) fire damage (included in the attacks).

traits.name: Illumination
traits.desc: The azer sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet. This feature does not activate while the azer is invisible.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The azer makes two attacks with its warhammer.

actions.name: Warhammer
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) bludgeoning damage, or 7 (1d10 + 2) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.
